lead_paragraph: It's a natural desire for parents to support their child's dreams, no matter the cost. But experts say there are ways parents can make their kids' participation in sports more positive and avoid sacrificing their own financial security.

headline.print_headline: Tips for Parents on Sports Participation and Spending
headline.main: Tips for Parents on Sports Participation and Spending
